item.title: Invalid default value for 'created_date_'
item.description: [ERR] 1067 - Invalid default value for ‘created_date_’[ERR] set global sql_mode = 'ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES,ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION';
